Title: Downloads Resources over HTTP
Description: steroids downloads zipped resources over HTTP, which leaves it vulnerable to MITM attacks. It may be possible to cause remote code execution (RCE) by swapping out the requested tarball with an attacker controlled tarball if the attacker is on the network or positioned in between the user and the remote server.
Solution: No fix is currently available for this vulnerability. It's recommended to not install nor use this module.
